sentences.sentence: Epidemic meningitis is not the biggest killer in Africa, but it is one of the most greatly fearful of all diseases.
sentences.translation: 流行性脑膜炎并非是非洲最大的杀手，但是，它是所有疾病中最令人感到恐惧的一个。

sentences.sentence: The invasive disease can present as bacteraemia or meningitis.
sentences.translation: 侵入性疾病可以表现为菌血症或脑膜炎。
